abstract: NBA Roundup; season ends early for Oklahoma City Thunder star forward Kevin Durant, league's reigning most valuable player who is set to undergo surgery on his injured right foot; basketball scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Durant will undergo a bone graft on his right foot next week, the Oklahoma City Thunder announced, and is not expected to resume basketball-related activities for four to six months.

headline.main: Kevin Durant to Have Bone Graft and Miss Rest of Season
headline.print_headline: Durant to Have Bone Graft and Miss Rest of Season

snippet: Durant will undergo a bone graft on his right foot next week, the Oklahoma City Thunder announced, and is not expected to resume basketball-related activities for four to six months.
